meanings.definition: Up to this time or point
meanings.sent1: She had never been hereunto so excited before.
meanings.sent2: The sun had set hereunto, signaling the end of the day.
meanings.sent3: The cat hereunto chased its tail in circles, amusing everyone.
meanings.sent4: His heart raced hereunto like a speeding train, full of anticipation.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's voice hereunto echoed in the empty classroom, hauntingly quiet.

meanings.sent2: The witness must swear hereunto to the truth of the statement.

meanings.sent4: Her commitment hereunto was as strong as steel, unbreakable.
